description: Try our easy to follow Roasted Salmon With Swiss Chard & Herb Butter recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Roasted Salmon With Swiss Chard & Herb Butter Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 handful fresh curly parsley, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: First, make the herb butter. Put the butter and herbs in a mixing bowl, and beat well until everything is combined. Spoon the butter onto a piece of greaseproof paper, then roll into a log shape. Twist the edges of the paper, and put the roll in the refrigerator.

Preheat the oven to 200°C. Sit the salmon fillets in a non-stick roasting tin, drizzle with the olive oil, and season with salt and black pepper. Bake in the oven for 15-20 minutes until the salmon is cooked through.

Meanwhile, cook the Swiss chard in a large pan of boiling salted water for 5-8 minutes until it still has a bite to it. Drain well, and transfer to a serving dish. Squeeze over the lemon juice, and add a pinch of chilli flakes.
Place the roasted salmon on top of the Swiss chard, with a slice of the herb butter on each piece, and serve immediately.
